short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate a guided experience on any platform with OKTA SSO (3rd Party or Your Own)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ziplyne's Player is here to assist you while executing any business process on the software you are using within your company. This technology will be there to help onboard, train and support you while making the end-user experience even easier ontop of the software you are using.

This version uses Okta to integrate with your Enterprise's existing authentication.
